Package org.vaadin.addons.de.f0rce.shepherd.config.tour

Class TourOptions

java.lang.Object
org.vaadin.addons.de.f0rce.shepherd.config.tour.TourOptions
public class TourOptions
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing the site tour.
Since:
v1.0.0
Author:
David "F0rce" Dodlek

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TourOptions()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TourOptions classPrefix​(java.lang.String classPrefix)
    The prefix to add to the shepherd-enabled and shepherd-target class names as well as the data-shepherd-step-id.
    TourOptions confirmCancel​(boolean confirmCancel)
    If true, will issue a window.confirm before cancelling.
    TourOptions confirmCancelMessage​(java.lang.String confirmCancelMessage)
    The message to display in the confirm dialog.
    TourOptions defaultStepOptions​(StepOptions defaultStepOptions)
    Default options for Step's, created through Step(StepOptions) or Tour.addStep(StepOptions).
    TourOptions exitOnEsc​(boolean exitOnEsc)
    Exiting the tour with the escape key will be enabled unless this is explicitly set to false.
    TourOptions keyboardNavigation​(boolean keyboardNavigation)
    Navigating the tour via left and right arrow keys will be enabled unless this is explicitly set to false.
    TourOptions tourName​(java.lang.String tourName)
    An optional "name" for the tour.
    TourOptions useModalOverlay​(boolean useModalOverlay)
    Whether or not steps should be placed above a darkened modal overlay.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • exitOnEsc

      public TourOptions exitOnEsc​(boolean exitOnEsc)
      Exiting the tour with the escape key will be enabled unless this is explicitly set to false.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • keyboardNavigation

      public TourOptions keyboardNavigation​(boolean keyboardNavigation)
      Navigating the tour via left and right arrow keys will be enabled unless this is explicitly set to false.
      Parameters:
      keyboardNavigation - boolean
      Returns:
      TourOptions

    • tourName

      public TourOptions tourName​(java.lang.String tourName)
      An optional "name" for the tour. This will be appended to the the tour's dynamically generated id property -- which is also set on the body element as the data-shepherd-active-tour attribute whenever the tour becomes active.
      Parameters:
      tourName - String
      Returns:
      TourOptions

    • useModalOverlay

      public TourOptions useModalOverlay​(boolean useModalOverlay)
      Whether or not steps should be placed above a darkened modal overlay. If true, the overlay will create an opening around the target element so that it can remain interactive.
      Parameters:
      useModalOverlay - boolean
      Returns:
      TourOptions
